texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.ManageTaskGroupsEfficiently: Manage task groups efficiently and elegantly
texts.StartByCreatingTaskGroup: Start by creating a new task group to organize your work
texts.UpdateTaskGroupDetails: Update task group details and information
texts.TaskGroupNotFound: Task group not found or you don't have permission to access it
texts.Title: Title
texts.EnterTaskGroupTitle: Enter a descriptive title for the task group
texts.EnterTaskGroupDescription: Enter a detailed description of the task group
texts.OptionalEndDate: Optional end date for the task group
texts.ErrorLoadingTaskGroup: Error loading task group. Please try again.
texts.ErrorUpdatingTaskGroup: Error updating task group. Please try again.
texts.EndDateMustBeAfterStartDate: End date must be after start date
texts.CreateNewTaskGroupDetails: Create a new task group to organize your work
texts.SelectStartDate: Select the start date for the task group
texts.CreateTaskGroupInfo: You will be automatically assigned as the owner of this task group. You can add team members and assign tasks after creation.
texts.TipChooseDescriptiveTitle: Choose a clear and descriptive title that reflects the purpose of the task group
texts.TipAddDetailedDescription: Add a detailed description to help team members understand the goals and scope
texts.TipSetRealisticDates: Set realistic start and end dates based on your project timeline
texts.TipEndDateOptional: End date is optional - leave it empty for ongoing or indefinite task groups
texts.ErrorCreatingTaskGroup: Error creating task group. Please try again.
texts.StartDateCannotBeInPast: Start date cannot be in the past
texts.ViewAllTaskGroupsInSystem: Browse and explore all task groups in the system
texts.ErrorLoadingTaskGroups: Error loading task groups. Please try again.
texts.NoTaskGroupsMatchingCriteria: No task groups match your search criteria. Try adjusting your filters.
texts.ViewMyTaskGroups: View and manage your own task groups
texts.YouHaveNotCreatedAnyGroups: You haven't created any task groups yet. Start by creating your first group!
texts.ErrorLoadingMyGroups: Error loading your groups. Please try again.
